Best plays from "The Playbook" episode on How I Met Your Mother

4.00 from 2 votes

Created: Nov. 25th, 2009

Barney shares his playbook with the rest of the gr

Tags:Ted Mosbey, Plays, Lorenzo Von Matterhorn, Playbook, How I met Your Mother

Complete

  • The Scuba Diver

    A series of unnecessarily complicated steps that end with you dressed in a scuba suit, and your friends picking up girls for you.

  • The Mrs. Stinsfire

    Like Mrs. Doubtfire, but in this case you're playing house mother to a group of sorority girls.

  • The He's Not Coming

    Stand at the top of the Empire State Building - or really anywhere that couples meet after spending years apart. From there, just approach every girl that's alone and say:

    "He's not coming."

    The success rate it pretty low, but it only takes one lonely, hopeful girl to make you instant rebound guy.

  • The Don't Drink That

    A bar girl is about to take a sip of her drink. You walk up, stop her from doing so and claim her drink is drugged. She thinks you saved her from disaster. You're a hero. She's ready go home with you.

  • The Lorenzo Von Matterhorn

    Turn yourself into an icon by creating a fake reputation online.

    The key to this routine is that you create enough content online to back your claims of superstardom.

    Once the unique name you created for yourself gets a high Google ranking, you can start approaching girls and act like a humble celebrity.

  • The Ted Mosby

    The old "I got left at the alter and now my life is spiraling out of control" schtick.

  • The My Penis Grants Wishes

    You dress up like a genie and then let the rest just play itself out naturally...
